## Feature Description

A clear and concise description of the feature you'd like to see.

## Problem Statement

What problem does this feature solve? Who would benefit from it?

## Proposed Solution

Describe how you envision this feature working.

## Alternative Solutions

Have you considered any alternative approaches?

## Use Case

Describe a specific scenario where this feature would be useful.

**Example:**
```
As a store owner, I want to track TikTok conversions,
so that I can measure ROI from TikTok ads.
```

## Implementation Ideas

If you have technical ideas on how to implement this, share them here.

**Example:**
```javascript
// Add TikTok endpoint mapping
'/ttevents': 'https://analytics.tiktok.com/i18n/pixel/events.js'
```

## Additional Context

Any other context, screenshots, or links about the feature request.

## Impact

How important is this feature to you?
- [ ] Critical (blocking my use of the proxy)
- [ ] High (significant improvement)
- [ ] Medium (nice to have)
- [ ] Low (minor improvement)

## Willing to Contribute?

- [ ] I'm willing to submit a PR for this feature
